artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: enclosed, walled area with central rectangular tower-like structure; "1914/1918" at top of structure; two tall purple poles at either side with wreath hanging from each; two crosses within enclosure; tall palm-like tree at right in enclosure
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [CIMETIRERE]
title: Cimetière, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
